paths.paragraph_left: Ready to quit your job and jump in full-time? Our 10-week Software Engineering Career Course covers everything you need to prepare for a career in Tech. Whether you're a beginner or looking for a leg up, this course will launch your career in tech.

Not quite ready to quit your job? We offer several evening and part-time courses to set you on the path to a career in tech. Start with our Intro to Web Development 3-week part-time class to learn the Basics. Then master Backend Engineering with our Intro to JavaScript and Node.js course. Round off the curriculum with React and master Frontend Engineering.
